trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows NT performance counter component.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows NT 性能计数器组件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, read-only instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> class, without associating the instance with any system or custom performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的只读实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>类，而无需将实例与任何系统或自定义性能计数器相关联。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the constructor sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> properties to empty strings (""), and sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> property to the local computer, (".").
trans-unit.target: 此重载的构造函数集<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A>属性设置为空字符串 ("")，并将设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A>到本地计算机中，属性 ("。")。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not initialize the performance counter, so it does not associate the instance with an existing counter on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不会初始化性能计数器，以便不将该实例关联与本地计算机上的现有计数器。

trans-unit.source: To point to a specific performance counter, set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>, and, optionally, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> properties before reading any other properties or attempting to read from a counter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指向特定性能计数器，设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>，以及 （可选）<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A>之前读取任何其他属性或尝试从计数器读取的属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write to a performance counter, set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.ReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要写入的性能计数器，设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.ReadOnly%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this member has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> | <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 应用于此成员的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>特性具有以下<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>属性值︰ <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>|<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource></xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource></xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>不影响桌面应用程序 （通常通过双击图标、 键入命令，或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动）。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, read-only instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> class and associates it with the specified system or custom performance counter on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的只读实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>类并将其与指定的系统或本地计算机上的自定义性能计数器关联。

trans-unit.source: This constructor requires that the category have a single instance.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数要求类别具有单个实例。

trans-unit.source: The parameter strings are not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 参数字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to access a counter on the local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于访问所属类别包含的单个性能计数器类别实例在本地计算机上的计数器。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use this constructor to point this <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用此构造函数来指出这<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>实例与包含多个实例，该构造函数引发异常的类别。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>

trans-unit.source: This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 此重载可以访问任何只读或读/写计数器，但会在只读模式下。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>使用此重载创建的实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是读/写。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>

trans-unit.source: This overload of the constructor sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> properties to the values you pass in, sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> property to the local computer, ".", and sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> property to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 此重载的构造函数集<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>中传递的值的属性，设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A>到本地计算机中，属性"。"，并将设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A>属性为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器 （系统或自定义计数器） 相关联。

trans-unit.source: The values that you pass in for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 您为传递的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>属性必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，必须为性能监视器用户组的成员，或者具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: >> 到避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The name of the performance counter category (performance object) with which this performance counter is associated.
trans-unit.target: 此性能计数器与之关联的性能计数器类别 （性能对象） 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 性能计数器的名称。

trans-unit.source: categoryName is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: categoryName为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: -或-counterName为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: -或者-指定的类别不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- The category specified is marked as multi-instance and requires the performance counter to be created with an instance name.
trans-unit.target: -或者-指定类别标记为多实例，并要求要使用实例的名称创建的性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: -or- categoryName and counterName have been localized into different languages.
trans-unit.target: -categoryName和counterName已本地化为不同的语言。

trans-unit.source: categoryName or counterName is .
trans-unit.target: categoryNameor counterName is .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Code that is executing without administrative privileges attempted to read a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行没有管理权限的代码尝试读取性能计数器。

trans-unit.target: 您为传递的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>属性必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the performance counter instance that you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果你指向的性能计数器实例不是有效的调用的构造函数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use this overload to connect to a system counter, but you cannot write to a system counter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以使用此重载来连接到系统计数器，但无法写入到系统计数器。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting `readOnly` to `false` when connecting to a system counter causes the constructor to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 因此，设置`readOnly`到`false`时连接到系统计数器引发构造函数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的类别实例`instanceName`已存在的新对象将引用现有的类别实例。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，必须为性能监视器用户组的成员，或者具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: >> 到避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, read-only or read/write instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> class and associates it with the specified system or custom performance counter and category instance on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的、 只读或读/写实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>类并将其与指定的系统或本地计算机上的自定义性能计数器和类别实例关联。

trans-unit.source: The parameter strings are not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 参数字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to access a performance counter in either read-only or read/write mode.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于访问性能计数器中任意一种只读或读/写模式。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the constructor sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> properties to the values you pass in, it and sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.MachineName%2A> property to the local computer, ".".

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器 （系统或自定义计数器） 相关联。

trans-unit.source: The values that you pass in for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 您为传递的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A>属性必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CategoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the performance counter instance that you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果你指向的性能计数器实例不是有效的调用的构造函数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use this overload to connect to a system counter, but you cannot write to a system counter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以使用此重载来连接到系统计数器，但无法写入到系统计数器。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting `readOnly` to `false` when connecting to a system counter causes the constructor to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 因此，设置`readOnly`到`false`时连接到系统计数器引发构造函数引发异常。

trans-unit.target: 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In Windows Vista, when the remote computer is a member of a workgroup, you may need to disable UAC so that the local user account is not filtered and can be elevated to an administrator account.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 中 Windows Vista 中，如果远程计算机是工作组的成员，你可能需要禁用 UAC，以便本地用户帐户未进行筛选，并可以将提升为管理员帐户。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, disabling UAC should be a last resort.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，禁用 UAC 应为最后一招。

trans-unit.source: For information on disabling UAC, see [User Account Control and WMI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617).
trans-unit.target: 在禁用 UAC 的信息，请参阅[用户帐户控制和 WMI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617)。

trans-unit.source: The CategoryName is displayed in the `Performance Object` field of Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in's `Add Counter` dialog box.
trans-unit.target: CategoryName 显示在`Performance Object`字段的性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元中`Add Counter`对话框。

trans-unit.source: A performance counter monitors the behavior of a category, or performance object, on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 性能计数器监视类别中或计算机上的性能对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: Categories include physical components (such as processors, disks, and memory) and system objects (such as processes and threads).
trans-unit.target: 类别包括物理组件 （如处理器、 磁盘和内存） 和系统对象 （如进程和线程）。

trans-unit.source: System counters that are related to the same performance object are grouped into a category that indicates their common focus.
trans-unit.target: 与相同的性能对象相关的系统计数器都分组到类别，该值指示其常见的焦点。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> class, you first indicate the category with which the component will interact, and then you choose a counter from that category.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>类，你首先指示该组件将进行交互，且然后从该类别中选择一个计数器的类别。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>

trans-unit.source: For example, one Windows counter category is the Memory category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个 Windows 计数器类别是内存类别。

trans-unit.source: System counters within this category track memory data such as the number of bytes available and the number of bytes cached.
trans-unit.target: 此类别中的系统计数器跟踪内存数据，如可用的字节数和缓存的字节数。

trans-unit.source: If you wanted to work with the bytes cached in your application, you would create an instance of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> component, connect it to the Memory category, and then pick the appropriate counter (in this case, Cached Bytes) from that category.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用在你的应用程序中缓存的字节，则将创建的实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>组件，将其连接到内存类别，然后挑选该类别中的相应计数器 （在此情况下，缓存字节）。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>

trans-unit.source: Although your system makes many more counter categories available, the categories that you will probably interact with most frequently are the Cache, Memory, Objects, PhysicalDisk, Process, Processor, Server, System, and Thread categories.
trans-unit.target: 尽管你的系统可以使许多更多计数器类别可用，你将可能与之交互最频繁的类别将是缓存、 内存、 对象、 物理磁盘、 过程、 处理器、 服务器、 系统和线程类别。

trans-unit.source: The name of the performance counter category (performance object) with which this performance counter is associated.
trans-unit.target: 此性能计数器与之关联的性能计数器类别 （性能对象） 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The CategoryName is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: CategoryName 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Closes the performance counter and frees all the resources allocated by this performance counter instance.
trans-unit.target: 关闭性能计数器并释放此性能计数器实例所分配的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: When you associate this <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> instance with a performance counter that resides on the server, the system initializes the instance and allocates memory to contain counter sample information.
trans-unit.target: 此关联时<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>实例驻留在服务器上，系统的性能计数器初始化实例，并分配内存以包含计数器样本信息。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>

trans-unit.source: The Close method frees the resources allocated by the object.
trans-unit.target: Close 方法释放由对象分配的资源。

trans-unit.source: Frees the performance counter library shared state allocated by the counters.
trans-unit.target: 释放分配的计数器的性能计数器库共享状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description for this performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 获取此性能计数器的说明。

trans-unit.source: The Add Counters dialog box of the Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in displays the CounterHelp text when a user selects a counter from the counters list and clicks the Explain button.
trans-unit.target: 添加计数器对话框中的性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元显示 CounterHelp 文本当用户从计数器列表中选择一个计数器，并单击解释按钮。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new counter, use the CounterHelp text to describe what the counter monitors do so the user can determine whether to add the counter to the System Monitor's display.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的计数器时，使用 CounterHelp 文本来描述哪些计数器监视器执行操作，以便用户可以确定是否将计数器添加到系统监视器的显示。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，必须为性能监视器用户组的成员，或者具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: >> 到避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: A description of the item or quantity that this performance counter measures.
trans-unit.target: 此性能计数器测量的数量或项的说明。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> instance is not associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"> </xref>实例不是与性能计数器相关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Code that is executing without administrative privileges attempted to read a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行没有管理权限的代码尝试读取性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the performance counter that is associated with this <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此关联的性能计数器名称<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: You can get a list of available pre-existing counters from the Windows Performance Manager’s [Add Counters dialog box](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854).
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取可用预先存在的计数器列表从 Windows 性能管理器的[添加计数器对话框](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the counter, which generally describes the quantity being counted.
trans-unit.target: 该计数器，通常描述所计算的数量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name is displayed in the list of counters of the Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in's Add Counters dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此名称显示在列表中计数器的性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元中的添加计数器对话框。

trans-unit.source: The CounterName is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: CounterName 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the counter type of the associated performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 获取相关的性能计数器的计数器类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType> enumeration contains the types of performance counters that you can interact with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType>枚举包含性能计数器可与之交互的类型。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType>

trans-unit.source: Some of the counter types represent calculated values, such as the average of the counter measurements the system has taken.
trans-unit.target: 某些计数器类型表示计算所得的值，如系统已进行的计数器度量值的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Other types represent raw, or uncalculated, values.
trans-unit.target: 其他类型表示原始，或非计算所得，值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the counter types that you will interact with most frequently.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示将与最常交互的计数器类型。

trans-unit.source: |Counter's Responsibility|PerformanceCounterType Value|Example| |------------------------------|----------------------------------|-------------| |Maintain a simple count of items or operations.|`NumberOfItems32`|Tracking the number of orders received as a 32-bit integer.| |Maintain a higher-capacity simple count.|`NumberOfItems64`|Tracking the number of orders for a site with very high volume, stored as a 64-bit integer.| |Track the number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond32`|Tracking orders received per second on a site.| |Track a higher-capacity number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond64`|Tracking orders received per second on a site with very high volume.| |Calculate the average time to perform a process or to process an item|`AverageTimer32`|Calculate the average time an order takes to be processed.| When you create a counter whose type requires the use of a corresponding base counter, you must declare the counter and the base in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationDataCollection> you pass into the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: |计数器的责任 |PerformanceCounterType 值 |示例 | |------------------------------|----------------------------------|-------------| |维护的项或操作的简单计数。 |`NumberOfItems32`|跟踪的订单收到作为 32 位整数的数量。 | |维护的更高容量简单计数。 |`NumberOfItems64`|跟踪的订单量很大的站点的数量，存储为一个 64 位整数。 | |跟踪的项目或每秒的操作数目。 |`RateOfCountsPerSecond32`|跟踪在站点上每秒接收的订单。 | |跟踪数项或每秒操作数之间的更高容量。 |`RateOfCountsPerSecond64`|跟踪在非常高容量的站点上每秒接收的订单。 | |计算的平均时间来执行进程或处理项目 |`AverageTimer32`|计算一份订单所要处理的平均时间。 | 在创建其类型需要使用相应的基本计数器的计数器时，您必须声明的计数器和中的基本<xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationDataCollection>则将传递给<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationDataCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，必须为性能监视器用户组的成员，或者具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: >> 到避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"></xref> that describes both how the counter interacts with a monitoring application and the nature of the values it contains (for example, calculated or uncalculated).
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"> </xref>描述同时监视应用程序和它包含的值的性质与计数器交互的方式 (例如，计算和非计算所得)。

trans-unit.source: The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Code that is executing without administrative privileges attempted to read a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行没有管理权限的代码尝试读取性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the associated performance counter by one through an efficient atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 递减逐个通过有效的原子操作的相关的性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: You can write only to custom counters.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编写仅向自定义计数器。

trans-unit.source: All system counters are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 所有系统计数器都是只读的。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>, and Decrement methods use interlocks to update the counter value.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>，和递减方法使用联锁更新计数器值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty.
trans-unit.target: 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A> property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A>属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: The decremented counter value.
trans-unit.target: 递减计数器值。

trans-unit.source: The counter is read-only, so the application cannot decrement it.
trans-unit.target: 计数器是只读的因此应用程序不能递减。

trans-unit.target: -或者-实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the global memory shared by performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 指定的大小，以字节为单位由性能计数器共享的全局内存。

trans-unit.source: The default size is 524,288 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 默认大小为 524,288 字节。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 初始化已结束<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>窗体或由另一个组件使用的实例。

trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or by another component.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]设计环境使用此方法来结束用于窗体或由另一个组件使用的组件的初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.BeginInit%2A>方法开始初始化。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the component from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 方法阻止完全初始化之前使用该组件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Increments the associated performance counter by one through an efficient atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 增加&1; 通过有效的原子操作相关的性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: You can write only to custom counters.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编写仅向自定义计数器。

trans-unit.source: All system counters are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 所有系统计数器都是只读的。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Increment, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A> methods use interlocks to update the counter value.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 递增<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A>方法使用联锁更新计数器值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty.
trans-unit.target: 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A> property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A>属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: The incremented counter value.
trans-unit.target: 递增的计数器的值。

trans-unit.source: The counter is read-only, so the application cannot increment it.
trans-unit.target: 计数器是只读的因此应用程序不能对其进行递增。

trans-unit.source: -or- The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: -或者-实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Increments or decrements the value of the associated performance counter by a specified amount through an efficient atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 递增或递减通过有效的原子操作指定的量相关的性能计数器的值。

trans-unit.source: You can write only to custom counters.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编写仅向自定义计数器。

trans-unit.source: All system counters are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 所有系统计数器都是只读的。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>, IncrementBy, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A> methods use interlocks to update the counter value.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>，IncrementBy，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A>方法使用联锁更新计数器值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty.
trans-unit.target: 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A> property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A>属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.RawValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value forthe <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: The value to increment by.
trans-unit.target: 要递增的值。

trans-unit.source: (A negative value decrements the counter.)
trans-unit.target: （负值递减计数器。）

trans-unit.source: The new counter value.
trans-unit.target: 新的计数器值。

trans-unit.source: The counter is read-only, so the application cannot increment it.
trans-unit.target: 计数器是只读的因此应用程序不能对其进行递增。

trans-unit.source: -or- The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: -或者-实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of a process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置进程的生存期。

trans-unit.source: If the performance counter category is created with the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, it uses global shared memory, and the value for InstanceLifetime must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 创建性能计数器类别，它使用全局共享的内存，并且 InstanceLifetime 的值必须为<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterType%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType>, the InstanceLifetime value for the performance counter must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterType%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType>，性能计数器的 InstanceLifetime 值必须为<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime></xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType></xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.CounterType%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value set is not a member of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值不是成员的<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: InstanceLifetime is set after the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: InstanceLifetime 后设置<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an instance name for this performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此性能计数器的实例名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the performance counter category instance, or an empty string (""), if the counter is a single-instance counter.
trans-unit.target: 性能计数器类别实例或空字符串的名称 ("")，如果计数器为单实例的计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the computer name for this performance counter
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此性能计数器的计算机名称

trans-unit.source: You can write values only to counters that reside on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在本地计算机上写入仅对驻留的计数器的值。

trans-unit.source: However, you can read counter values from any computer in the enterprise for which you have access privileges.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以读取计数器值从为其企业中的任何计算机具有访问权限。

trans-unit.source: When you set the MachineName property to point to a remote computer, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> instance attempts to open the counter on that computer.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 MachineName 属性以指向远程计算机，<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>实例会尝试打开该计算机上的计数器。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>

trans-unit.source: If the counter does not exist, setting this property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果计数器不存在，则设置此属性将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The server on which the performance counter and its associated category reside.
trans-unit.target: 在其的性能计数器和其关联的类别所驻留的服务器。

trans-unit.source: The MachineName format is invalid.
trans-unit.target: MachineName 格式无效。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a counter sample, and returns the raw, or uncalculated, value for it.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个计数器样本，并为其返回原始，或非计算所得，值。

trans-unit.source: This method is generally used for counters that contain uncalculated values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于包含非计算所得的值的计数器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，必须为性能监视器用户组的成员，或者具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: >> 到避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterSample"></xref> that represents the next raw value that the system obtains for this counter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterSample"> </xref> ，表示为此计数器获取系统的下一步原始值。

trans-unit.source: The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Code that is executing without administrative privileges attempted to read a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行没有管理权限的代码尝试读取性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a counter sample and returns the calculated value for it.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个计数器样本，并为其返回计算的值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the calculated value of a counter depends on two counter reads, the first read operation returns 0.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 如果计数器的计算的值取决于两个计数器读取，第一次读取的操作返回 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the performance counter properties to specify a different counter is equivalent to creating a new performance counter, and the first read operation using the new properties returns 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 重置要指定不同的计数器的性能计数器属性等效于创建新的性能计数器，并使用新的属性的第一个读取的操作返回 0.0。

trans-unit.source: The recommended delay time between calls to the NextValue method is one second, to allow the counter to perform the next incremental read.
trans-unit.target: 对 NextValue 方法的调用之间的建议的延迟时间为&1; 秒，以允许要执行的下一个增量读的计数器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 读取性能计数器，你必须具有管理特权。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The next calculated value that the system obtains for this counter.
trans-unit.target: 系统为此计数器获取下一个计算的值。

trans-unit.source: The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Code that is executing without administrative privileges attempted to read a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行没有管理权限的代码尝试读取性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the raw, or uncalculated, value of this counter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此计数器的 raw、 或非计算所得，值。

trans-unit.source: If the counter type is a 32-bit size and you attempt to set this property to a value that is too large to fit, the property truncates the value to 32 bits.
trans-unit.target: 如果计数器类型为 32 位大小，并且你尝试将此属性设置为太大，无法安装一个值，该属性会截断到 32 位的值。

trans-unit.source: When reading custom counters on the local computer, using the RawValue property rather than a calculated value can produce significantly better performance in scenarios where the raw value is sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 在读取本地计算机上的自定义计数器时，使用 RawValue 属性，而不是计算得出的值会产生显著提高性能的足够的原始值的情况。

trans-unit.source: If the counter that you are reading is read-only, getting the RawValue property samples the counter at the time that the property is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在阅读的计数器是只读的则获取 RawValue 属性的属性称为次示例计数器。

trans-unit.source: This action is equivalent to making an initial call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.NextSample%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此操作等效于初始调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.NextSample%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.NextSample%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you subsequently call <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.NextSample%2A>, you can perform calculations on the values that both calls returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果您随后调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.NextSample%2A>，你可以对两个调用返回的值执行计算。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.NextSample%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because system counters are read-only, you can get but not set their raw values.
trans-unit.target: 由于系统计数器是只读的您可以获取但未设置其原始值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A> methods use interlocks to update the counter value.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A>方法使用联锁更新计数器值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Decrement%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.IncrementBy%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty.
trans-unit.target: 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the RawValue property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新的 RawValue 属性直接多达 5 倍的性能提高。

trans-unit.source: However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，必须为性能监视器用户组的成员，或者具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: >> 到避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The raw value of the counter.
trans-unit.target: 计数器的原始值。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to set the counter's raw value, but the counter is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 你尝试设置该计数器的原始值，但该计数器是只读的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: -或者-实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Code that is executing without administrative privileges attempted to read a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行没有管理权限的代码尝试读取性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> instance is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>实例是否处于只读模式。

trans-unit.source: For a system counter, ReadOnly should always `true`.
trans-unit.target: 对于系统计数器，ReadOnly 应始终`true`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot write to a system counter.
trans-unit.target: 无法写入系统计数器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> instance is in read-only mode (even if the counter itself is a custom .NET Framework counter); <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is in read/write mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>实例是否处于只读模式 （即使该计数器本身是自定义的.NET Framework 计数器）;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果它处于读/写模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value set by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是由构造函数设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the category instance specified by the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> object <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定的类别实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>对象<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName*>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceName*>

trans-unit.source: You can remove an instance only for a custom counter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以删除仅用于自定义计数器实例。

trans-unit.source: All system counters are read-only, so attempting to remove one of them throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 所有系统计数器都是只读的因此在尝试删除其中一个将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid a possible race condition when the performance counter shared memory is released, it is recommended that the RemoveInstance method be called from the <xref:System.AppDomain.DomainUnload> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要避免可能的争用情况，释放性能计数器共享内存时，建议从调用 RemoveInstance 方法<xref:System.AppDomain.DomainUnload>事件处理程序。</xref:System.AppDomain.DomainUnload>

trans-unit.source: To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的类别实例`instanceName`已存在的新对象将引用现有的类别实例。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>属性是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> must be <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别用于全局共享的内存，并且值<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。

trans-unit.source: This counter is read-only, so any instance that is associated with the category cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: 此计数器是只读的因此无法删除与类别关联的任何实例。

trans-unit.source: -or- The instance is not correctly associated with a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: -或者-实例不是与性能计数器正确关联。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*> property is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref> when using global shared memory.
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstanceLifetime"></xref>何时使用全局共享内存。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 的系统时出错。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Me), which does not support performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Me)，不支持性能计数器。
